All Classes

Class Summary 
Class Description
Application
Application is the client side app, which will create an user-interface for our clients, to run the application on their systems.
Client
The client class where we store the user information.
ClientHandler
Client handler is a server side thread to handle client in our multi-thread server.
DataBaseConnector
Database connector is created to make a connection to database and managing the data manufacturing methods.
DataBaseManager
Database Manager is our server side program that allows the website admin to get connected to database and check the tables or modify them.
Note
The note class where we store the data of a single line note for a user.
NoteClient
Note client is our client handler in application.
NoteServer
Note server is our application multi-thread server which connects to a mySQL database and handles the clients.
Terminator
Terminator is a thread that allows us to shutdown the server at anytime we want, In case of anything goes wrong.
